question_text:
You have a Fabric workspace that contains an eventstream named EventStream1. EventStream1 outputs events to a table in a lakehouse.
You need to remove files that are older than seven days and are no longer in use.
Which command should you run?
discussion:
The default retention period for the VACUUM command is 7 days, therefore it will remove files older than 7 days.

VACUUM is the corrected answer

A is correct

vacuum

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/fabric/data-engineering/lakehouse-table-maintenance
